short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restrict Google search results to the sites you love

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get clean Google search results from eductional sites, Reddit, or HackerNews. 

Simply toggle one of the filters from the Google UI and search with the search bar.

THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING.
